500.$description: Base accent color - lighter, more cyan-blue. Used for highlights and expressive elements.

600.$description: Slightly darker than base, compressed scale keeps it close to 500

700.$description: Used for accent buttons - compressed scale, lighter and more expressive

800.$description: Medium shade, compressed scale keeps it relatively light

900.$description: Darkest accent - compressed scale keeps it light for highlights. Good contrast with both white and dark text.
